message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly.  No need to play this out any longer.
Not an even split, Bob. Try again!
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share to end this quickly.
Not good enough, Bob. I want a bigger share!
I'm taking control now. You can either accept or get nothing!
We're getting close to the end. Let's split it a little more in your favor, but I won't accept anything less.
Not quite there, Bob. I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, Bob. Accept or get nothing!
I'm taking a risk here, Alice. If you reject this, we both get nothing. Think carefully.
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not there yet!
You're running out of options, Bob. This is my final offer!
Alice, this is my final offer. We are both on the brink of getting nothing. I'm willing to take a small share to avoid that outcome. Accept or we both walk away empty-handed.
Fine, Bob. You've managed to squeeze out a small share. Congratulations.
